overview: Witness the larger-than-life true story of Ricky Donnell Ross -- also known by his street moniker "Freeway Rick" -- who made history in the 1980s and '90s as one of the most notorious drug dealers in the business, pulling in daily profits ranging from $300,000 to $1 million. Rising from poverty and illiteracy, he climbed to a level that no one expected, spreading his empire from the streets of New York and Los Angeles to everywhere in between.
title: The Real Rick Ross Story
